title: SONY Vegas Pro 13.0 Build 373 (x64) RePack by D!akov
description:
Sony Vegas PRO - professional program for multitrack recording, editing and assembling video and audio streams. Tools contained in 'Vegas Pro', allow editing and processing in real-time formats, DV, AVCHD, HDV, SD / HD-SDI and XDCAM Ã¢â€žÂ¢, a precise adjustment of audio, the creation of surround sound and dual-layer DVD. You can burn Blu-ray discs directly from timeline to preserve records in high quality. Creating a standard DVD with a complex video, subtitles, multilingual menu and add comments there is no trouble. 

List of main features present in version Pro: 
Includes DVD Architect software version 6.0 and not 5.0 
Assembling and writing Blu-ray discs from the program DVD Architect (actually, the ability to record Blu-ray and DVD sets 
Architect version 6.0 from earlier) 
Create 5.1 surround sound (in previous versions - only stereo) 
Ability to save and restore the window layout interface 
Ability to include custom color palette interface 
View the video on an external monitor via DVI (digital video output), and not only through DV-camera connected to 
DV-interface (IEEE1394) 
Number of video tracks: no restrictions (in previous versions - up to 4) 
Video effects and transitions: a complete set (in previous versions, not all) 
Tools for color correction: a complete set (in previous versions only the primary color correction) 
Professional Lighting Effects 
Measuring instruments for video: WFM / Vector / Parade / Histogram 
Effect ProType Titler to create sophisticated titles (in previous versions only a simple module creating the text) 
Support for XDCAM format 
Tools for working with AVCHD cameras and XDCAM EX Device Explorer 
Video processing with 32-bit precision floating point 
Support for interfaces SD / HD-SDI 
Gradient wipe video transition 
Support for gigapixel images 
Support for projects with a resolution of 4K (up to 4096x4096 pixels) 
Support audio format Broadcast Wave 
Support for database Gracenote CDDB 
The maximum sound quality: 24 bit/192kHz (16 kHz bit/48 in previous versions) 
Number of tracks: no restrictions (in previous versions - up to 4) 
Number of audio processing effects: a complete set, including 5.1 surround 
Support for folders with sets of effects 
Support for the effects DirectX Ã‚Â®: complete (including the automation parameter changes)
Envelopes of sound: volume / panorama (there in previous versions) and effects parameters (this in previous versions do not) 
Substitute sound recording 
Monitoring recording audio input 
Effects of processing the entire project and the sound of tires (groups of tracks) 
Create and burn Red Book Audio CD 
Recording automation envelopes (changing processing parameters) 
Keyboard "pruning" clips 
Inheritance of projects (to open in the project other projects) 
Import / export of AAF format 
Material management system (media manager) 
Support the execution of scripts 
Support for external control consoles 
Support for the AJA Xena LH, LHe, LS and LSe (only Digital) 
Customizable user templates 
Capture format Compressed Sony MXF through interfaces SD / HD-SDI 
Support for OpenEXR and DPX 
Support files RED ONE Ã¢â€žÂ¢ (. R3d)

Command line options: 
Silent install Russian version: / S / R 
Silent install English version: / S / E 
Also possible to select the directory for installation: After all the keys you need to add / D =% path% Example: setup file.exe / S / R / D = C: Program
